subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Defenseman Adrian Aucoin is retiring after 17 seasons in the N.H.L. Aucoin, 40, who played last season for the Columbus Blue Jackets, recorded 121 goals and 278 assists in 1,108 N.H.L. games.
